data.comment: The match is underway in Lyon.
The match is underway in Lyon.

Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lyon's Lucas Tousart gets in a shot on goal at Groupama Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Lyon Lyon's Bertrand Traore is caught offside.
Throw-in Lyon.
Lyon have a dangerous throw-in.
Frank Schneider awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
In Lyon Saint-Etienne attack through Lois Diony. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lyon.
Throw-in for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Lyon.
Frank Schneider signals a Lyon throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Frank Schneider signals a throw-in for Lyon, close to Saint-Etienne's area.
Can Lyon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
Throw-in for Lyon close to the penalty box.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.

Lyon are in shooting range from this free kick.
Mathieu Debuchy is booked for the away team.
Moussa Dembele scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Martin Terrier to set up the goal.
Moussa Dembele for Lyon is whistled offside.
Lyon drives forward and Martin Terrier gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Lyon.

Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
